Truong-Son Van

In Vietnamese: Văn Phụng Trường Sơn

Teaching

I am a Mathematician working at Fulbright University Vietnam. I was a Hans Rademacher Instructor in the Department of Mathematics at the University of Pennsylvania from 2021-2022. Prior to Fall 2021, I was a student of Gautam Iyer and Bob Pego at Carnegie Mellon University. My current research interest lies in some intersection between partial differential equations and probability. I am particularly keen on turning real-world phenomena into theorems.
